Class codFiler 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----codFiler
public class codFiler
extends Object
Class to read and write g592 machine code.

Author:
Ethan Georgi

codFiler()
Constructor.

closeCodeFile()
Close the code file.
createCodeFile()
Create a new file for code using the name stored by store(String filename).
emitCode(Instruction, int)
Write an instruction to the code file.
getCodeFilename()
What's the name of the code file we're using?
getNextInstruction()
Fetch the next instruction from the code file.
removeCodeFile()
Remove the code file.
retrieveCodeFile(String)
Open a code file for reading.
seeCodeFile()
Display the code file nicely.
store(String)
Save the filename to use for code.

codFiler 
 public codFiler()
Constructor.

store 
 public void store(String filename)
Save the filename to use for code.

createCodeFile 
 public void createCodeFile()
Create a new file for code using the name stored by store(String filename). Calls removeCodeFile()

retrieveCodeFile 
 public void retrieveCodeFile(String filename)
Open a code file for reading.

Parameters:
filename - The code file to open- getCodeFilename()
closeCodeFile 
 public void closeCodeFile()
Close the code file.

removeCodeFile 
 public void removeCodeFile()
Remove the code file. Calls closeCodeFile()

getCodeFilename 
 public String getCodeFilename()
What's the name of the code file we're using?

Returns:
The Code Filename
emitCode 
 public void emitCode(Instruction i,
                      int inum)
Write an instruction to the code file.

Parameters:
i - The instruction to write
inum - The instruction number
getNextInstruction 
 public Instruction getNextInstruction()
Fetch the next instruction from the code file.

Returns:
The next instruction
seeCodeFile 
 public void seeCodeFile()
Display the code file nicely.
